m64tweak.name: Start Cap levels without Cap
m64tweak.description: Start each of the Cap levels without their appropriate cap.

patch.name: Start Metal Cap level without Cap
patch.description: Start the Metal Cap level off without the Metal Cap.

patch.name: Start Vanish Cap level without Cap
patch.description: Start the Vanish Cap level off without the Vanish Cap.

patch.name: Start Wing Cap level without Cap
patch.description: Start the Wing Cap level off without the Wing Cap.
